description.brief: Diagnosis Observers provides current observations coming from the system

package.description: This package provides a set of observers like DOBs, GObs, NObs, QObs, BiQObs, MObs, PObs and HObs. An observer is a software entity actin like ROS node that observers particular property of the system or part of the system. Observation is a First Order Logic (FOL) sentence.
package.author: Safdar Zaman, Gerald Steinbauer
